author: Xbox
description:
Amon is the Forgeknight of Borderlands 4, a resilient and highly customizable frontliner who can use his weaponized drones to adapt to any situation.

His Forge arsenal lets him attack or defend as needed, ready to pulverize enemies with a Forgehammer, slice them in twain with Forgeaxes, soak up damage with a Forgeshield, and much, much more.

Borderlands 4 is now available for pre-order on Xbox Series X|S!
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/borderlands-4/9NVSKL161M60

author: Xbox
description:
Hyper Units, it is time to descend into the cryptic, atmospheric world of MOEBIUS, where the remnants of mankind remain trapped inside decaying cores, and ASKA may be the key to their salvation.

Her story begins to surface. A forgotten past. A devastating transformation.
From human… to weapon.

METAL EDEN immerses you in an adrenaline-fueled sci-fi FPS that fuses fast-paced combat, cybernetic parkour, and an intricately crafted narrative world, where humanity's consciousness has transcended the body.

METAL EDEN releases on September 2nd 2025 on Xbox.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/metal-eden/9pp1whrp17bk

author: Xbox
description:
You’re being tossed into the buggiest season yet with Fortnite’s Battle Royale Chapter 6, Season 4: Shock ’N Awesome!

The bugs out there? Vicious, relentless, swarming. The Island is an absolute mess of goopy nests and egg sacs. Prepare to stomp and smash the swarm with the O.X.R., the Island’s anti-bug military defense force.

If you’re serious about stomping roachies, then you’ll want to pick up new weapons issues by O.X.R. ike the Leadspitter 3000 minigun, Sweeper Shotgun, O.X.R. Rifle, Wrecker Revolver, or the laser-guided Swarmstrike rocket launcher.

And don’t forget about leveling up with the Shock ‘N Awesome Battle Pass to knock the socks off the swarm with style! New Outfits include:

UNSC Spartan
Yoo-mi
Agent Patch
Battle Gamer Mae
Lt. Ripp Slade
Onyx Winter
Green Ranger

Time to pelt pests, eliminating opposing enemies, and loot those Chests.

Good luck out there, soldier!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/fortnite-battle-royale/9P6LNN3KZ75R

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx
title: Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 6 Season 4: Shock 'N Awesome | Hybrid Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Rain World (Base Game Only) is out now on GamePass!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/rain-world/9pnpfbplgcmw

In Rain World, you are a nomadic slugcat, both predator and prey in a broken ecosystem. Explore hundreds of rooms in search of food, shelter, and your family while avoiding dangerous creatures and hazards before the deadly rain starts. Each region brings their own unique visuals and environment along with new challenges and secrets to survival. Use the tools you find to navigate the treacherous world.
